case_title: United States of America v. McLemore
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. McLemore

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) - POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE BASE(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 188 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT AS TO COUNT 2, AND 60 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT AS TO COUNT 3 TO RUN CONSECUTIVE TO THE SENTENCE IN COUNT 2; 4 YEARS SUPERVISED RELEASE ON EACH COUNT TO RUN CONCURRENTLY; $200.00 SPECIAL ASSESSMENT

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)(1)(A) - POSSESSION OF A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME(3)

charges.charge_disposition: 188 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT AS TO COUNT 2, AND 60 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT AS TO COUNT 3 TO RUN CONSECUTIVE TO THE SENTENCE IN COUNT 2; 4 YEARS SUPERVISED RELEASE ON EACH COUNT TO RUN CONCURRENTLY; $200.00 SPECIAL ASSESSMENT
